TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListBox/ObjectCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListBox.ObjectCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 中项的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of items in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类存储中显示的项。The class stores the items displayed in the . 有两个其他集合中定义使您能够确定哪些项目在此集合中选择的类。There are two other collections defined within the class that enable you to determine what items are selected within this collection. 类提供的属性和方法来确定哪些项目在中选择，虽然类使您能够确定中的哪些索引选择。The class provides properties and methods for determining what items are selected within the , while the class enables you to determine what indexes within the are selected. 有多种方式可向集合添加项。There are a number of ways to add items to the collection. 方法提供的功能添加到集合的单个对象。The method provides the ability to add a single object to the collection. 若要添加到集合的对象数，请创建项的数组，并将其分配给方法。To add a number of objects to the collection, you create an array of items and assign it to the method. 如果你想要在集合中的特定位置插入一个对象，则可以使用方法。If you want to insert an object at a specific location within the collection, you can use the method. 若要删除项，你可以使用方法或方法如果你知道项是位于集合内。To remove items, you can use either the method or the method if you know where the item is located within the collection. 方法使你能够从而不是使用集合中移除所有项方法一次都移除单个项。The method enables you to remove all items from the collection instead of using the method to remove a single item at a time. 您还可以操作的项使用属性。You can also manipulate the items of a by using the property. 如果你使用属性将项添加到，你可以查看中的项使用属性，但你无法添加或使用的方法从列表中删除项。If you use the property to add items to a , you can view the items in the using the property but you cannot add or remove items from the list using the methods of the . 除了用于添加和移除项，方法和属性还提供了方法来查找集合中的项。In addition to methods and properties for adding and removing items, the also provides methods to find items within the collection. 方法使您能够确定对象是否是集合的成员。The method enables you to determine whether an object is a member of the collection. 一旦您知道项位于集合内，你可以使用方法来确定该项目集合中的位置。Once you know that the item is located within the collection, you can use the method to determine where the item is located within the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个所有者绘制通过设置属性`OwnerDrawVariable`值和处理和事件。The following code example demonstrates an owner-drawn by setting the property to the `OwnerDrawVariable` value and handling the and events. 它还演示如何设置和属性，并使用方法。It also demonstrates setting the and properties and using the method. 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到空的窗体中导入命名空间和命名空间。To run this example, paste it into an empty form that imports the namespace and the namespace. 调用`InitializeOwnerDrawnListBox`从窗体的构造函数或`Load`方法。Call `InitializeOwnerDrawnListBox` from the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of based on another .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你无法创建此类的实例，而无需将其与控件。You cannot create an instance of this class without associating it with a control. 此版本的构造函数使你能够使用的现有实例中指定的项目类来创建时添加到集合的项。This version of the constructor enables you to use the items specified in an existing instance of the class to add items to the collection when it is created. 你可以使用此构造函数使用在另一个指定的项与此集合的控件。You can use this constructor to use the items specified in another control with this collection.

summary.span: 向 的项列表添加项。

span.span: Adds an item to the list of items for a .

returns.span: 集合中项的从零开始的索引；如果已调用 ，则为 -1。

span.span: The zero-based index of the item in the collection, or -1 if has been called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`，该项插入到列表按字母顺序。If the property of the is set to `true`, the item is inserted into the list alphabetically. 否则，在列表末尾插入项。Otherwise, the item is inserted at the end of the list. 若要将项插入到位于特定位置的列表框中，使用方法。To insert an item into the list box at a specific position, use the method. 若要将一组项添加到单个操作中的列表框中，使用方法。To add a set of items to the list box in a single operation, use the method. 如果你想要使用方法将大量的项添加到列表，请使用和方法，以避免从重新绘制每次项将添加到列表之前的所有项都添加到列表。If you want to use the method to add a large number of items to the list, use the and methods to prevent the from repainting each time an item is added to the list until all items are added to the list. 当将项添加到，它是第一次的项进行排序，然后添加新项更加高效。When adding items to a , it is more efficient to sort the items first and then add new items. 当一个对象添加到集合，首先检查是否属性类具有中获取项文本时指定为引用的对象的成员的名称。When an object is added to the collection, the first checks to see if the property of the class has the name of a member from the object specified to reference when obtaining the item text. 如果属性不具有指定的成员，然后调用方法要获取要在列表中显示的文本的对象。If the property does not have a member specified, the then calls the method of the object to obtain the text to display in the list. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建列中显示多个项，并且可以有多个项在控件的列表中选择的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that displays multiple items in columns and can have more than one item selected in the control's list. 该示例的代码添加到 50 个项使用方法类，然后选择三个项从列表使用方法。The code for the example adds 50 items to the using the method of the class and then selects three items from the list using the method. 然后，该代码显示中的值集合 (通过属性) 和(通过属性)。The code then displays values from the collection (through the property) and the (through the property). 此示例需要的代码是位于并从调用。This example requires that the code is located in and called from a . [!code-cpp[Classic ListBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ListBox Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ListBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ListBox Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ListBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ListBox Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Adds an array of items to the list of items for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`，向列表按字母顺序插入项。If the property of the is set to `true`, the items are inserted into the list alphabetically. 否则，按它们发生在该数组中的顺序插入项。Otherwise, the items are inserted in the order that they occur within the array. 此方法通常传递的数组对象，但任何类型的对象的数组可以传递给此方法。This method is typically passed an array of objects, but an array of any type of object can be passed to this method. 当一个对象添加到集合，首先检查是否属性类具有中获取项文本时指定为引用的对象的成员的名称。When an object is added to the collection, the first checks to see if the property of the class has the name of a member from the object specified to reference when obtaining the item text. 如果属性不具有指定的成员，然后调用方法要获取要在列表中显示的文本的对象。If the property does not have a member specified, the then calls the method of the object to obtain the text to display in the list. 在使用此方法时将项添加到，不需要调用和方法来优化性能。When using this method to add items to the , you do not need to call the and methods to optimize performance. 当将项添加到，它是第一次的项进行排序，然后添加新项更加高效。When adding items to a , it is more efficient to sort the items first and then add new items. 你可以使用此方法将一组项添加到列表或重复使用存储在不同的项。You can use this method to add a group of items to the list or to reuse the items stored in a different . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个所有者绘制通过设置属性`OwnerDrawVariable`值和处理和事件。The following code example demonstrates an owner-drawn by setting the property to the `OwnerDrawVariable` value and handling the and events. 它还演示如何设置和属性，并使用方法。It also demonstrates setting the and properties and using the method. 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到空的窗体中导入命名空间和命名空间。To run this example, paste it into an empty form that imports the namespace and the namespace. 调用`InitializeOwnerDrawnListBox`从窗体的构造函数或`Load`方法。Call `InitializeOwnerDrawnListBox` from the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`，向列表按字母顺序插入项。If the property of the is set to `true`, the items are inserted into the list alphabetically. 否则，按它们发生在该数组中的顺序插入项。Otherwise, the items are inserted in the order that they occur within the array. 此方法通常传递的数组对象，但任何类型的对象的数组可以传递给此方法。This method is typically passed an array of objects, but an array of any type of object can be passed to this method. 当一个对象添加到集合，首先检查是否属性类具有中获取项文本时指定为引用的对象的成员的名称。When an object is added to the collection, the first checks to see if the property of the class has the name of a member from the object specified to reference when obtaining the item text. 如果属性不具有指定的成员，然后调用方法要获取要在列表中显示的文本的对象。If the property does not have a member specified, the then calls the method of the object to obtain the text to display in the list. 在使用此方法时将项添加到，不需要调用和方法来优化性能。When using this method to add items to the , you do not need to call the and methods to optimize performance. 当将项添加到，它是第一次的项进行排序，然后添加新项更加高效。When adding items to a , it is more efficient to sort the items first and then add new items. 你可以使用此方法重复使用存储在不同的项。You can use this method to reuse the items stored in a different .

summary.span: 移除集合中指定索引处的项。

span.span: Removes the item at the specified index within the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当从列表中移除项时，列表中的后续项的索引将更改。When you remove an item from the list, the indexes change for subsequent items in the list. 删除有关已移除的项的所有信息。All information about the removed item is deleted. 此方法可用于通过指定要从列表中删除的项的索引，从列表中删除特定项。You can use this method to remove a specific item from the list by specifying the index of the item to remove from the list. 若要指定要删除而不是项的索引的项，使用方法。To specify the item to remove instead of the index to the item, use the method. 若要从列表中删除所有项，使用方法。To remove all items from the list, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用具有属性属性以将当前所选的项移动到中的显示区域的项列表的顶部。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property with the property to move the currently selected item to the top of the list of items in the display area of the . 该示例还演示了如何删除使用项方法类，以及如何清除所有项选择使用方法。The example further demonstrates how to remove items using the method of the class, and how to clear all item selection using the method. 代码首先移动当前选定的项到列表的顶部。The code first moves the currently selected item in the to the top of the list. 然后，代码中移除当前选定项之前的所有项并清除中的所有选择。The code then removes all items before the currently selected item and clears all selections in the . 此示例需要包含项添加到窗体和项是当前在中选择。This example requires that a containing items is added to a form and that an item is currently selected in the . [!code-cpp[ListBox.SelectedIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.SelectedIndex/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListBox.SelectedIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.SelectedIndex/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListBox.SelectedIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.SelectedIndex/VB/form1.vb#1)]
